page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: Church of England:Rector:Rev R.B. Gregory who lives in the Rectory built in 1984 next to Broadmayne church ;has charge of 4 parishes & 5 churches.2 lay readers assist.Of 10 churchwardens,6 are female.The churchyards are voluntarily maintained.Services:Broadmayne each Sunday,Warmwell,2 Sundays per month. Family services attract the highest attendance:80-100.Activities:Young Wives,St.Martins Circle,4 children groups,Bible Study,Prayer Groups, Flower Guild,Church Magazine:10p monthly.Recent trends show more lay participation especially by women. Methodist:18 members,Broadmayne chapel built in 1865.Superintendent Minister: Rev.David Reep of Dorchester.Local preahers assist with the 2 Sunday services .Interdenominational Sisterhood weekly.Also other churhes.
